content.raw: This is live as of yesterday in our lab. One thing that came up is that there should be a standard storage location instead of the `self.last_opened_shots_folder`. I would change the FileDialoges to always open the folder `(labscriptfolder)/userlib/runviewer_configs`(and create it if it doesn't exist) is that a good location or are there better places?
content.html: This is live as of yesterday in our lab. One thing that came up is that there should be a standard storage location instead of the self.last_opened_shots_folder. I would change the FileDialoges to always open the folder (labscriptfolder)/userlib/runviewer_configs(and create it if it doesn't exist) is that a good location or are there better places?
